actions.label: Hand mirror
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "h" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: LeaderKey settings
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 37 using {command down, option down, control down, shift down}'

actions.label: Emojis
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 49 using {control down, command down}'

actions.label: Calendar
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "g" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Tasks
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Gmail
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Fill screen
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 36 using {control down, option down}'

actions.label: Annotate
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "v" using {option down, shift down}'

actions.label: Clear overlay
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "7" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Pin
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "8" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Google
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "s" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: Perplexity
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "p" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'

actions.label: ChatGPT
actions.value: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "o" using {shift down, command down, option down, control down}'
